document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

bibRefCitation.author: Rosenschold, E. M.
bibRefCitation.refString: Rosenschold, E. M. (1838) [new taxa]. In: Schoenherr, C. J. Genera et species curculionidum, cum synonymia hujus familiae. Species novae aut hactenus minus cognitae, descriptionibus a Dom. Leonardo Gyllenhal, C. H. Boheman, et entomologis aliis illustratae. Vol. 4 (2). Roret, Parisii and Fred. Fleischer, Lipsia, pp. 601 - 1124.

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Europe, Caucasus, Asia Minor , Levant, Iran , Middle Asia ( Caldara 2013a ).

Biology. Meadows in forests, stony slopes, sandy habitats. Adults occur in V–VIII. On Scrophulariaceae :
Verbascum densiflorum
,
V. thapsus
( Wingelmüller 1937 ; Hoffmann 1958 ; Smreczyński 1976 ; Gumovsky 1997);
V. nigrum
,
V. sinuatum
( Hoffmann 1958 ; Gumovsky 1997);
V. lychnitis
,
V. phoeniceum (Isayev 2007)
.
